name: Play Heroes
description:
Play as a brother and sister, fighting as a team against imaginary creatures in your backyard. 

Rules:

- Kill as many enemies as possible, without also murdering your blood relative.
- Move using WASD
- Use SPACE for everything else

NOTE : the windows downloadable loads a whole bunch faster. If you can use it, you are welcome to try it

Made for Brackey's Game Jam.

Pirhana - Art, Design, Programming
MajorBruno - Music, Sound Effects
